title: Teemo the Bush Satan (Poem)
body:
I leave my lane and head for my jungler
I claw my way through a bush
I help him out with that beast
Then return to my lane to push

A few levels in my blind is superior
The Tryndamere lays in wait
He slays a minion then spins into my trap
Too bad I was the bait!

My mushroom explodes and he stands in confusion
The poison begins to work
A few auto attacks later and he ulted
I sit under my turret with a smirk

Tryndamere didn’t return for a while
And from the lack of kills my heart sank
I heard a small rustle from the bush
Oh god no it’s a gank!

I popped a ghost and ran for the hills
I lay in a bush in for a while
Nidalee passed over one of my shrooms
And my I burst out with a smile



I weave in and out of her traps
A spear whizzed past my head
A few auto attacks and a final ignite
I began to realize I was fed

I pushed out my lane and took out the tower
I headed for the bush and left a ward
I backed and got me a Nashor’s Tooth
Which with 2 kills I could afford

The rest of the game was full of fun
Shrooming up the place
The enemy team thought they could take baron
Luckily that wasn’t the case

I lay in wait invisible to the naked eye
Baron Nashor fought hard
But just as he was about to die
It was time to pull out my last card

I burst from my stealth
And stole the rest of his health
And flashed over the wall with glee!

replies.body: For making a poem about the furry dark lord, you shall be punished.
you just explained why every1 hates teemo
